help.name: shout
help.description: Posts a custom message to the discord #broadcast channel and to the group shout simultaneously. Typically used for broadcasting events.
help.notes:
To clear a shout once an event is over type, ">shout clear"
The roles default to @everyone

msgTooLong.message: The message is too big for roblox. Please enter it manually in the broadcast channel.

embedTitle: %s has issued a broadcast to the group shout & broadcast channel.
